feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:54 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: W 24 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
